text.BMIunder16: Severely Underweight: You do not currently qualify for plastic surgery. Look towards changing your eating habits to gain weight. Please consult your general physician/doctor.
text.BMI16to16: Very Low Weight: We do not recommend plastic surgery. It is recommended to put on some weight to be considered for qualification. Please consult your general physician/doctor.
text.BMI17to18: Underweight: You may qualify for certain plastic surgery procedures. It is recommended to put on some weight to be considered for qualification. Please consult your doctor for know your options.
text.BMI18to24: Healthy: You currently qualify for most plastic surgery procedures. However, you probably do not have enough fat specifically required for a Liposuction (Liposculpture) procedure.
text.BMI25to29: Overweight: You are the ideal patient for a plastic surgery procedure. You are able to undergo combined procedures with due medical consultation and precautions.
text.BMI30to34: Obese Type 1: You are good candidate for plastic surgery of any kind. You are able to undergo combined procedures with due medical consultation and precautions.
text.BMI35to39: Obese Type 2: You may qualify for single, non-combination surgical procedures, though caution must be exercised due to high risk of complications. Please consider losing additional weight and consulting your general physician/doctor in order to qualify for additional surgery procedures.
text.BMI40to59: Obese Type 3: You don't qualify for plastic surgery. Please consider losing additional weight and consulting your general physician/doctor in order to qualify for plastic surgery procedures.
text.under18: It is not recommended you undergo plastic surgery. Please talk to your parents and your general physician/doctor to discuss the right alternative options available to you.
text.between50and60: A general medical check-up is recommended before seeking consulting for plastic surgery.
text.between60and70: Plastic surgery options may be limited. A general medical check-up is recommended first before opting for plastic surgery.
text.between70and80: Plastic surgery options may be very limited. A general medical check-up is recommended. Please first consult with your doctor to discuss options available to you.
text.over80: You, probably won't qualify for plastic surgery. Please first consult with your doctor to discuss options available to you.
text.textComingSoonFYD1: Find certified doctors around the world to practice plastic surgery.
text.textComingSoonFYD2: In each country you will find specialized companies, guaranteed worldwide.
text.textComingSoonFYD3: You can meet the most prominent doctors in each country.
